data.title: Fix yaml removals
data.body: Fixes #9196

data.title: Rename ActorMap *UnitsAt* occurences to *ActorsAt*
data.body: 'Units' usually implies only mobile, non-building actors.

data.title: Charge now using ticks and fixed extra bar time formula.
data.body:
ChargeTime has been changed to ChargeDelay and is
measured in ticks rather than seconds.

The formula for working out the extra bar time has  
been fixed to work properly at different charge delays.

This addresses the comments from @penev92 and @pchote in #9700. Extra bar correctly works at different charge times.

data.title: Unhardcode tick rates
data.body:
There are parts of the codebase that still use the hardcoded 25 tick per second value, as pointed out in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/9700#discussion_r42584770.
Including the place that the PR touched but was merged before unhardcoding.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/27576118-unhardcode-tick-rates?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Add Height property to BlocksProjectiles
data.body:
`Blockable` projectiles now compare the height of potential blockers with their own distance above ground.

Default `Height` is intentionally high so the shipping mods (or mods based on them) won't be affected, unless modders consciously make use of this.
Used to give the Tick Tank the ability to shoot over walls from certain positions (reproduces original behavior).

Possible TODO (might need help with that): Visualize height in `CombatDebugOverlay`.

data.title: Misc yaml formatting cleanup
data.body:
Purpose of this is to reduce the 'noise' produced by applying upgrade rules.

Adds `Music:` to all maps, additionally fixes an issue with the `WithMuzzleFlash` -> `WithMuzzleOverlay` upgrade rule.

data.title: 0 $ when loading a map with pre-placed spice
data.body: I forgot about the `D2kEditorResourceLayer` in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/9139.

data.title: Fix Tanya's Colt targeting buildings
data.body: This should fix #9673.

data.title: Increase D2k aircraft speed
data.body:
While I'm relatively sure that the current values are correctly or at least closely replicating the original speeds (normalized to our gamespeed), I agree with #9680 that they somewhat hamper gameplay.

I tried to chose values that don't make carryalls and ornithopters too hard to hit by missiles. The frigate's speed can be reverted once we can make them appear from the closest map border cell.

data.title: Add a common ChromeLogic base class and lint verification.
data.body:
This makes all of our chrome logic classes inherit from a new `ChromeLogic`, and adds a lint pass that checks that all the referenced logics exist and are of the correct type.

This puts the foundations in place for the next PR, which will replace the conceptually ugly `LogicTickerWidget` with a `Tick` function on the chrome logic classes themselves.

data.title: Chronotank uses extra bar when charging.
data.body:
The two blue pips have been replaced by
a magenta charge bar.

![ctank](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3636652/10622783/945d1334-7781-11e5-8504-3d349f5d2640.gif)

Closes #9558 if accepted.

data.title: Added ScreenMap.partitionedEffects
data.body: Some kind of first try to tackle https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/9443. I don't know how to measure performance to see if it worked. There is a problem that effects don't have bounds and effects can be visible, but can also be something completely different like `DelayedAction` that renders nothing. Not sure about best practices on this.

data.title: Game crashed when I input text in filter field in "Choose Map" dialog
data.body:
After installation of some map game crashed after start of filtering maps by name, using input filed.

Exceptional log:

```
Red Alert Mod at Version release-20150919
on map 04936ef1e2b49e43291c3c42d13bcaa2e089c00f (Desert Shellmap by Scott_NZ).
Operating System: Linux (Unix 3.13.0.58)
Runtime Version: Mono 3.2.8 (Debian 3.2.8+dfsg-4ubuntu1.1) CLR 4.0.30319.17020
Exception of type `System.NullReferenceException`: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
  at OpenRA.Mods.Common.Widgets.Logic.MapChooserLogic+<EnumerateMaps>c__AnonStorey7.<>m__1 (OpenRA.MapPreview m) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Linq.Enumerable+<CreateWhereIterator>c__Iterator1E`1[OpenRA.MapPreview].MoveNext () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Linq.Enumerable.ToArray[MapPreview] (IEnumerable`1 source) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Linq.QuickSort`1[OpenRA.MapPreview]..ctor (IEnumerable`1 source, System.Linq.SortContext`1 context) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Linq.QuickSort`1+<Sort>c__Iterator0[OpenRA.MapPreview].MoveNext () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Mods.Common.Widgets.Logic.MapChooserLogic.EnumerateMaps (MapClassification tab, OpenRA.Mods.Common.Widgets.ScrollItemWidget template) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Mods.Common.Widgets.Logic.MapChooserLogic+<MapChooserLogic>c__AnonStorey0.<>m__4 () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Mods.Common.Widgets.TextFieldWidget.HandleTextInput (System.String text) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Widgets.Widget.HandleTextInputOuter (System.String text) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Widgets.Ui.HandleTextInput (System.String text) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.DefaultInputHandler+<OnTextInput>c__AnonStorey1.<>m__0 () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Sync.CheckSyncUnchanged[Boolean] (OpenRA.World world, System.Func`1 fn) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.DefaultInputHandler.OnTextInput (System.String text) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Renderer.Sdl2.Sdl2Input.PumpInput (IInputHandler inputHandler) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Renderer.Sdl2.Sdl2GraphicsDevice.PumpInput (IInputHandler inputHandler) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Graphics.Renderer.EndFrame (IInputHandler inputHandler) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.RenderTick () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.Loop () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.Run () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Program.Run (System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Program.Main (System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
```

data.title: Don't force SmarIrc4net to be copied to output
data.body:
Instead, it will be implicitly included since it is a reference. This avoids pulling in the documentary .xml file.

Supersedes #9683.

data.title: Allow VS2015 to format solution file
data.body: VS like to streamroll over the format of this file all the time - keeping the version in the repo in line with its arbitrary whims likes removes a mild nuisance for VS users as it won't dirty the working directory (which then requires it to be reset when rebasing, etc).

data.title: Fix solution file
data.body: VS2015 was producing a warning during loading of the solution stating it could not load some of the properties. This rectifies it.

data.title: remove SmartIrc4net .XML file after dependencies download
.Attack() doesn't work in recent builds
data.body: The computer isn't attacking objects like barrels with the .Attack() command in recent builds. You can check this in the intro for soviet02a, soviet03 or soviet07.

data.title: Integrate global chat with the lobby.
data.body: The next step towards #9451.  A future PR will add unread message counts to the tab labels, but that depends on some wider widget refactoring that will come in the next PR.

data.title: Add gas projectile for veins and chem missile

milestone.title: Tiberian Sun Public Alpha
milestone.description: An incomplete list of blockers for a public alpha release.

data.body:
The projectile wanders randomly around the map at a slow rate until a timer expires, damaging anything that it touches.  The implementation will be similar in some ways to #9357, but much simpler since there is no ray-casting involved.

</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Allow maps to define custom tileset additions
data.body:
http://resource.openra.net/maps/6132 has some impressive custom terrain, but relies on a really horrible hack (see http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=83&t=18951) to do it.  It would be great if we could support this properly, but this is going to be fiddly to do without breaking our existing caching.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/27535700-allow-maps-to-define-custom-tileset-additions?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Add *.xml to gitignore
data.body:
`SmarIrc4net.xml` shows up as new file all the time, which is quite annoying.

The only other .xml in the main folder is the StyleCop one, so this shouldn't cause any problems.

data.title: Polish mapchoosers
data.body: Fixes some issues that have crept in over the last few UI prs.

data.title: Fix D2K refinery flames.
data.body: Fixes #9670.
